reviewText: The video worked it just smelled very strong
Video was as described. Works well and brings back great memories. Shipped fast.

In this touching "Ramona" episode, Ramona is thrilled to receive a brand-new pair of pajamas, as opposed to her older sister's hand-me-downs. She likes them so much that she wears them under her school clothes. Her teacher finds out about it, a phone call is made home, and Ramona, feeling angry and betrayed, threatens to run away. Her mother's method of helping Ramona realize her value to the family is very sweet and touching. Coupled with Beverly Cleary's classic books, these simple and enjoyable videos are perfect for young children and "Ramona" fans alike.
